title: Metamorphosis of a Butterfly
brief_description: Metamorphoses du papillon is a two minute 1904 film directed by French filmmaker Gaston Velle. It features early special effects, elaborate costumes and hypnotic dances that show a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly.

constellations_other.name: Colour and creativity
constellations_other.description: From dying film to Technicolor and beyond, creative applications of colour have been part of cinema since its inception.

description: The stages that a caterpillar goes through, from larvae to chrysalis, to become a butterfly.
description_for_label: The stages that a caterpillar goes through, from larvae to chrysalis, to become a butterfly.
